lead_paragraph: Stocks dropped a bit in afternoon trading, along with the price of oil. A report showed a slight increase in inflation last month.

headline.print_headline: Indexes Slip in Slow Pre-Holiday Trading
headline.main: Oil Prices Slide, Nudging the Market Downward

snippet: Stocks dropped a bit in afternoon trading, along with the price of oil. A report showed a slight increase in inflation last month.
abstract: Stocks fall after quiet week of trading.
